terms_conditions.title: Terms & Conditions
terms_conditions.message:
* Promo codes are subject to maximum cash back amounts
* Promo codes are not valid for recharges, bill payments, bus ticket bookings, gift cards & deals
* Cash back acquired from promo codes to be credited within 24 hours of your product being shipped
* Cash back received will not be credited back to your bank account
